title: Beyond the Job: 30 Ways for Older Teens and Young Adults to Develop Effectively
description: Beyond the Job - 30 Ways for Older Teens and Young Adults to develop Effective Leadership Skills shows that it takes more to being a leader than getting a job where you are identified as a leader. It is about identifying yourself, and having other people recognize you, as a leader, as a young man or woman of integrity, as someone who has the mindset of success, and who is able through your actions to influence others to be the best that they can be. This book shows how becoming a leader has to be intentional, with you making the all-important decisions to acquire the habits and ways of thinking and behaving that identify you as the true leader you are meant to be.
author: Israelin Shockness
